title: Get rid of the premade groups!
body:
Seriously they have a ranked groups for a reason

Hows it fair that i get put up with a 4 man group and they surrender for the lols and trolls and i get nothing to say about it

This is Fucking Bullshit riot!!!!!!
3 times this has happened,  once we were about to take their nexus and they 4 man surrender

replies.body:
I agree that 4man premades are literally the worst thing in league, and IMO people should only be able to queue as 1,2,3 and 5s. More often than not the 4man toxicity is astounding. 

You can avoid being the oddone out by playing in a[ 5man premade of your own](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment). With all of the incentives being thrown at you (increased IP, mastery points and hextech stuff) there is literally nothing to lose. It also makes it way easier to climb.

I work on rotating shifts at  work
i could one week be on early shifts or next week finishing at midnight

i cant guarantee im available for teams

Since surrender votes always fail when 2 say no, the easiest way to deny them is to bring a friend. While having larger premades is beneficial in other ways, it isn't necessary to go overboard and find a full team if you just want to make sure a game doesn't end before it should.
Just have a bunch of friends who you can play with. That way if you're not available, they still have a team. Teams can have 8 members, remember.

I dun have any friends.  That play league. . They all dota or cod.
I got one friend but he is bronze 1 and won't queue with me cos hes better

I did carry myself to bronze 4 but then went on a massive losing streak back to bronze 5 so ive given up on ranked andjjust play normals

League is a team game, so pre-made groups are suppose to be a thing.
They just need to bring back Duo-Solo Q again.
It wasn't meant to turn into this big issue, you can still solo.
Its just gonna be harder and such.

Try opening/Having a TS/Discord server up (Discord is free)
This way you can be a solo, while getting the 4 other randoms involved.
Communication is key!
